sn23.12:1.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:
sn23.12:1.3: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘susceptible to Māra’.
sn23.12:1.5: “Rādha, form is susceptible to Māra. Feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are susceptible to Māra.
sn23.12:1.7: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
